body:
All Versions

  • Fixed bug that prevented users from selecting 3 digit zip wildcard in some areas.
  • Added a menu link to the old version of Network360.

Network360 Only

  • Compare Networks: Added the ability to add multiple comparison networks (equivalent to version 1 Project Summary reports).
  • Compare Networks: Changed volatility quadrant to use a volatility percentage as the results instead of just total counts.
  • Compare Networks: Changed specialty group quadrant to use network composition percentages instead of just total counts.
  • Compare Networks: Added rank column to the list tab on the Network Strength detail page.
  • Compare Networks: Revised overlap and exclusive methodology to mimic Version 1.
